attributes.action: Law of the Rights of Mother Earth - UK
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, believe that humans and the planet are deserving of equal rights. On October 15th 2012 Bolivia became the first country to recognise this formally by introducing the Law of the Rights of Mother Earth. We call upon the UK Government to review our own laws to see what steps can be taken to create a more respectful balance between the rights of humans and the rights of the planet.
